item.title: The other queen by Philippa Gregory
item.description: About the book Author: Gregory, Philippa Title: The other queen Publication: London : HarperCollins, 2008. ISBN 9780007190348. DAISY audio format narrated by Anne Glatt and Marc Rosen. CELA library call number DC34129. 442 pages in the paperback edition; 13 hrs., 37 mins. as a recorded book. About the story Set in the 16th century England of Elizabeth I, this historical novel tells the story of Mary, Queen of Scots (1542-1587).
